column3: Provide room to express their experience and feelings.

column4: The design we proposed provides students to share their experience and feelings…

column3: Do you think there should be a discussion session afterward?

column4: Oke

column3: [presentation] Our idea is about, we provide a box to the student so they can share their story, their bad experience or their good experience into this two different boxes, anonymous way. So we provide a way to then express their feelings and then the teacher will pick up one happy story and one sad story.

And then asks the students to act out/roleplay in the classroom. The ones who wrote down a good story will experience a bad story, and after that we will have a discussion session for them to exchange their opinion so we want to through this way give children to express their experience and feeling and also raise their empathy for others.
